name: Be Spoiled Body Butter Sampler
description:
Spoil yourself rotten with a sample of all three of our exquisite and rich butters! Our butter sampler includes a 0.5 oz serving of all three butters:

Be Forgiven - Coffee Cinnamon 
Be Passionate - Mango Coconut 
Be Free - Strawberry Ginger 

Directions: For softer, healthier skin, use as a part of your daily skin regimen. For best results use as a daily moisturizer to heal, protect, and nourish your skin.

Ingredients: ***See individual butter***

name: Be Spoiled Body Scrub Sampler
description:
Can't pick a favorite, we understand...Our sampler will give you the fix you need. included in this sweet pack is a 4 oz treat of each of our sugar scrubs:

Be Forgiven - Coffee Cinnamon (minimize cellulite and heal dry skin)
Be Passionate - Mango Coconut (Anti-aging and anti-inflammatory)
Be Free - Strawberry Ginger (reduce body acne and lighten dark spots)

Directions: rub into skin using a circular motion, rinse and dry skin as usual. For best results use 2-3 times  weekly as a part of your shower or bath regimen.
WARNING: Shower/Tub surface may become slippery when using product. For external use only. 

Ingredients: *** See individual Scrub for list of ingredients****

name: Whipped Body Butter 8 oz
description:
Rich and decadent; Be Spoiled Butter is great for repairing damaged skin, exzema, strechmarks, scars, and more! Use on those tough areas (cracked heels, elbows, knees, etc.) and watch the magic take affect! Your skin will thank you for this luxurious treat!

Directions: For softer, healthier skin, use as a part of your daily skin regimen. For best results use as a daily moisturizer to heal, protect, and nourish your skin.

see websit for detail ingredients list www.ComeGetSpoiled.com

name: Body Scubs - 8oz
description:
Your Skin has never looked so smooth! Be Spoiled all natural body scrubs help to heal dry cracked skin, eczema, cellulite, body acne, and signs of aging. Excellent for dry cracked areas (heels, elbows, etc.), stretch marks, and more! 

 Directions: rub into skin using a circular motion, rinse and dry skin as usual. For best results use 2-3 times  weekly as a part of your shower or bath regimen.
WARNING: Shower/Tub surface may become slippery when using product. 

For detailed ingredients and product use visit our full website at 
www.ComeGetSpoiled.com
